structure.unit: B MEDICAL IMAGING, RADIATION THERAPY, AND RELATED OCCUPATIONS

law.catch_line: Board to recognize and enforce national standards.
law.text: The board shall recognize and enforce the current rules and regulations, practice standards, scopes of practice, and ethical standards for the nationally recognized professional organizations and certifying bodies for technologists and therapists regulated by this chapter.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2012.
